name: Flick Basketball Shooting
description:
Bring the popular street basketball game to your mobile!

Flick and toss the basketball into the hoop! It is the top quality 3D basketball shooting game.

Well it°Øs the same like most of the basketball shooting game you got balls, hoops and limited time so just swipe and shoot but attention please, there°Øs a slightly difference here which is you, yes there°Øs an amazing action camera effects, which at the same time makes it more challenging.

Toss the basketball into the hoop with a swipe of your finger, try your hand at this amazing real life basketball challenge!

Features

-Realistic physics and amazing sound effects
-Swipe up to shoot
-Fun game for all age groups
-Great shooting experience
-Amazing action camera effects
-Bonus shot
